Room.Name: Open Skies Over Nartiz Hills
Room.ShortDescription: You are near the eastern edge of the Nartiz Mountain Range. 50.n0.e0.s0.w3
Room.LongDescription: There are wooded foothills below you, and from time to time you see tiny villages or lone cottages. This area is known for its large number of open gold and silver mines. Although this part of the sky is clear, there are a lot of clouds over the entire area.
